pages.text: With their eyes looking down (in humiliation), they come out of their graves as if they were spreading locusts
Rushing toward the caller, the disbelievers say: this is a difficult day
People of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant (Noah) and they said a madman, and he was outcast
So he called on his Master: I am defeated, so help
So We opened the gates of the sky with downpour of water
And We gushed out springs from the earth. The waters joined for a matter that was destined (the flood)
And We carried him on (the Ark) having timbers and nails
It sailed under Our eyes, a reward for him who was rejected (Noah)
And We have certainly left it as a sign, so does anyone take notice
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Aad denied, so how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a continuous ice cold wind upon them on a miserable day
knocking the people over as if they were uprooted trunks of a palm tree
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Thamud denied the warnings
And they said: should we follow him, a single human being among us? Then indeed we are in error and madness
Is the reminder only given to him among us? No, he is a rude liar
Tomorrow they are going to know who the rude liar is
Indeed We are senders of the female camel as a test for them, so watch them and be patient
